title: Survival token

properties.name: description
properties.value: Survival tokens are special currency that is obtained by selling various weapons, armour, food, and potions to a vending shrine during a game of Last Man Standing. The amount of tokens given is dependent on the item.

content:
Survival token was removed after an update.
As the contents of this page no longer exist in Old School RuneScape, this article is preserved for historical purposes.
Survival token
Released4 August 2016 (Update)
Removal29 August 2019 (Update)
MembersNo

StackableYes
DestroyDrop
ExamineThis can be used to claim items from vending shrines.
Values

AlchemyNot alchemisable
Weight0 kg
Advanced data
Item ID20527

Survival tokens are special currency that is obtained by selling various weapons, armour, food, and potions to a vending shrine during a game of Last Man Standing. The amount of tokens given is dependent on the item.

The tokens can then be used to purchase more valuable items from the vending shrine:

Item Cost
Monkfish 2
Shark 3
Prayer potion(1) 4
Super energy(1) 2
Adamant arrow pack 8
Rune arrow pack 10
Catalytic rune pack 10
Elemental rune pack 8
Ancient magicks tablet 10
Maple shortbow 2
Magic shortbow 15
Rune scimitar 3
Toktz-xil-ak 10
Dragon scimitar 20
Dragon dagger 12
Abyssal whip 35
Rope 2
Rune platebody 8
Rune platelegs 8
3rd age robe top 8
3rd age robe 8
Black d'hide body 8
Black d'hide chaps 8
Amulet of accuracy 6
Mithril gloves 5
Climbing boots 4
Mystic boots 4
Snakeskin boots 4

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
4 August 2016
(update)

The item was made fully available with the release of Last Man Standing.

21 July 2016
(update)

The item was added to Last Man Standing beta, but was unobtainable.

[[File:Survival token detail.png|left|130px]]
'''Survival tokens''' are special currency that is obtained by selling various weapons, armour, food, and potions to a [[vending shrine]] during a game of [[Last Man Standing]]. The amount of tokens given is dependent on the item.

The tokens can then be used to purchase more valuable items from the vending shrine:
